name: Hi Hotel
description:
Hi Hotel is the right choice for guests who want to combine charm with tranquility and a convenient location to discover ██████.

It is a small, comfortable hotel on the ██████████ Canal, with a careful and personalized service offered to the clientele by the █████ family and his team, always available for any requests.

The hotel has █████ floors, no elevator. On the ground floor, in addition to the reception, you will find a pleasant little lounge where you can sit for tea or just reading and a beautiful terrace to immerse yourself in the typical Venetian atmosphere. discovering early morning the bustle of the city on the canal and the swarm of people who invade the streets and squares with their chatter.

The rooms are on the first, second and third floors. The top floor opens onto a charming terrace, or solarium, available to guests who can enjoy an incredible view.

Breakfast is served buffet style in the ground floor room and even outside, in summer, in our small patio.

The hotel has an internet point and a Wifi network. a̴̻̟̒̃́̋͘ň̴͙͉͖̳̺͌̇͌͠ͅd̵͉̒̍̿́̂͗ͅ ̶̧̥͉̬̹̬̾͐ĕ̵̗̪̩̒͂̏̑̕x̶͔͉͉͚̓͜p̴̧̡̛͇l̶͚͙̻̋͌̀̈͋o̸̦͍̾͜ȓ̵̝̯͍̑̂e̸͎̮͍͛ͅͅ.
